about_the_game:
Includes:

Three commanders, a $30 value, created at the request of our Kickstarter backers, and available for sale for all players.

Access to the digital orchestral soundtrack download.

Access to the digital artbook and wallpapers download.
detailed_description:
Includes:

Three commanders, a $30 value, created at the request of our Kickstarter backers, and available for sale for all players.

Access to the digital orchestral soundtrack download.

Access to the digital artbook and wallpapers download.
name: Planetary Annihilation - Digital Deluxe Add-on

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista SP2 64-bit
  • Processor:32 or 64-bit Dual Core or better
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Shader 3.0 / OpenGL 3.0 +
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Additional:These specs are still being determined.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Quad Core
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Chip (Not Integrated) / OpenGL 3.0+
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Additional:These specs are still being determined.

short_description: Planetary Annihilation, three bonus commanders your can conquer the galaxy with, the digital soundtrack, and when it's ready, the digital artbook download! Add-on version. Doesn't include game.
